summary: Catherine finds herself in a web of deception and lies when she finds out that the fiance of her friend Aiswarya might not be as "Gentleman" as he seem.
cast: Nani|Surabhi|Vennela Kishore|Tanikella Bharani|Rohini|Satyam Rajesh|Ramaprabha|Sri Mukhi|Srinivas Avasarala|Joy Badlani|Srujan Kottapally|Swathi Poosapati|Charan Ram|Nivetha Thomas|Reuben Witsenhuysen|Vamsi Raghava Yenumula
director: Directors: Mohana Krishna Indraganti (as Mohan Krishna Indraganti), Mohana Krishna Indraganti
title: Gentleman
